briefdescription.para: Validates the SFN property of a message.
Validates the slot property of any message.

detaileddescription.para: Validates the number of PDU Groups property of a DL_TTI.request or UL_TTI.request, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.2 and 3.4.3.

briefdescription.para: Validates the CW index property of a Tx_Data.request message, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.6.
Validates the payload property of a custom Tx_Data.request TBS-TLV, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.6.
Validates the RNTI property of a CRC.indication PDU or Rx_Data.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.8 // and 3.4.7.

detaileddescription.para: Validates the RAPID property of a CRC.indication PDU or Rx_Data.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.8 and 3.4.7.

briefdescription.para: Validates the HARQ ID property of a CRC.indication PDU or Rx_Data.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.8 // and 3.4.7.
Validates the TB CRC status property of a CRC.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.8.
Validates the UL SINR metric property of a CRC.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.8.
Validates the timing advance offset property of a CRC.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.8.

detaileddescription.para: Validates the timing advance offset in nanoseconds property of a CRC.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.8.

briefdescription.para: Validates the RSSI property of a CRC.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.8.
Validates the RSRP property of a CRC.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.8.

detaileddescription.para: Validates the symbol index property of the RACH.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.11 in table RACH.indication message body.
Validates the slot index property of the RACH.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.11 in table RACH.indication message body.
Validates the RACH index property of the RACH.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.11 in table RACH.indication message body.
Validates the AVG RSSI property of the RACH.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.11 in table RACH.indication message body.
Validates the RSRP property of the RACH.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.11 in table RACH.indication message body.
Validates the preamble index property of the RACH.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.11 in table RACH.indication message body.
Validates the timing advance offset of the RACH.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.11 in table RACH.indication message body.
Validates the timing advance offset in nanoseconds property of the RACH.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.11 in table RACH.indication message body.
Validates the preamble power property of the RACH.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.11 in table RACH.indication message body.
Validates the message id property of the ERROR.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.3.6.1 in table ERROR.indication message body.
Validates the error code property of the ERROR.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.3.6.1 in table ERROR.indication message body.
Validates the expected SFN property of the ERROR.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.3.6.1 in table ERROR.indication message body.
Validates the expected SFN property of the ERROR.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.3.6.1 in table ERROR.indication message body.

Validates the PDU tag property of the Rx_Data.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.7 in table Rx_Data.indication message body.
This validator only accepts the custom tag.
Validates the PDU value property of the Rx_Data.indication PDU, as per SCF-222 v4.0 section 3.4.7 in table Rx_Data.indication message body.
